sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Incidental) As an incidental, when performing the Stim Application action, the character may increase the difficulty of the Medicine check to Hard (3 difficulty dice) as an incidental. If he does so, the target of the action suffers one strain instead of four.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Stim Application (Improved)</name> <number>TAL0001225</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-14 13:02:42</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a815d0e62fbf1490e0f497eef699b6ed</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-14 13:02:42</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
